about_the_game:
The demo of Better With A Friend contains the full mini game Dots N Boxes and 3 Trivia Categories for you to try out with a friend! The full game is a growing collection of mini games for the Steam Deck that you can only play with somebody else and where I will be adding extra content over time. 

Better With A Friend is a homage to older games that I used to play back in the day during high school. Either on paper, some random flash game website, one of my first phones or a DOS PC that later became the Windows 95 computer. The time that it was virtually impossible to play against each other over the internet. Not counting those text based browser strategy games that my friends and I frequently visited during computer class. You basically had to be at the same place with all your friends to play games. For some games even sharing a keyboard or mouse.
